synopsis.text: Shimamura Joe, a misfit orphan, finds himself transformed into a cyborg with extraordinary abilities, along with eight other individuals from diverse backgrounds, by the sinister Black Ghost organization. Led by the malevolent Skull, Black Ghost aims to trigger a global war by flooding the world with deadly weapons. However, the group of unwilling cyborgs, with the help of a rogue scientist, rebel against their creators. As Cyborg 009, Joe and his team stand as the world's last defense against the impending chaos. Based on Ishinomori Shoutarou's manga from the late 1960s, Cyborg 009 is a thrilling tale of courage and resistance against evil. The anime spans 48 episodes on TV, followed by a recap and the 'GOD'S WAR' OVA, with the final episode remaining unaired.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
